rslots 0.1.0
  • Reference

    rslots

    A slot machine simulator in R.

    Installing this package 

    #install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_packages("benyamindsmith/rslots")

    Using this package

    To play a game of slots, simply run:

    rslots::play()

    To keep track of your balance assign it to a variable:

    # Example
x<- rslots::play()

    Similar packages

    • casino - available games include poker, blackjack and slots. Additionally its possible to track preformance
    • Rcade- play much more advanced HTML5 games in the R console.
